readme:
# Based C - Official RO Scripting Language.

Based C Official GRAVITY Plug-In for VS Code. Supports NPC Scripts and CSV DB files.

# Atom AEGIS language support

This extension provides AEGIS language syntax highlighting and code snippets.

## Installation

Visit [the extension's page](https://github.com/gravitycorporation/BasedCRO-Atom) on Github or [the Atom download page](https://atom.io/packages/aegis-language-support).

Usage:

> 1. Clone this repository.
> 2. Move the folder you cloned (BasedCRO-Atom) into your %userprofile%/.atom/packages/.
> 3. Open your Atom.
> 4. Go to File > Settings > Install.
> 5. Use the "Search packages" bar to install your package using the directory previously configured in step 2.

or

> 1. Open your Atom.
> 2. Go to File > Settings > Install.
> 3. Use the "Search packages" bar to install your package searching for: aegis-language-support.

## Special thanks

This extension was initially ported from [JoWei's Script Highlighting for Athena](https://github.com/JoWei/language-athena) for Atom editor.

## License

This extension is licensed under the MIT license.
